pull.title: Bugfix: Trivial: RPC: getblockchaininfo help: pruneheight is the lowest, not highest, block
pull.body: I'm not really happy with the new language I'm replacing it with either. Any suggestions?

events.message: Bugfix: Trivial: RPC: getblockchaininfo help: pruneheight is the lowest, not highest, block

events.body: Well it's better than "heighest", and is a precise description of the field so ACK from me

issue.title: Port  misc pruning stuff from core
issue.body:
Port form core this 3 prune related PRs:

#8765: [Wallet] remove "unused" ThreadFlushWalletDB from remove prunedfunds
#8884: Bugfix: Trivial: RPC: getblockchaininfo help: pruneheight is the lowest, not highest, block
#8076: VerifyDB: don't check blocks that have been pruned
